set terminal postscript eps enhanced
set output 'step-error.eps'
set size 0.7, 0.7
set logscale x
set logscale y
set grid
set title 'Error convergence for Re = 100'
set key 3500,0.004
set xlabel 'Degrees of Freedom'
set ylabel 'Relative L_2 error [%]'
plot [200:200000]'-' w l linetype 1 linewidth 3 title 'hp-FEM', '-' w l linetype 2 linewidth 3 title 'h-FEM', '-' w lp linetype 1 pointtype 3 title 'uniform, p = 2', '-' w lp linetype 1 pointtype 5 title 'uniform, p = 3' , '-' w lp linetype 1 pointtype 7 title 'uniform, p = 4' , '-' w lp linetype 1 pointtype 9 title 'uniform, p = 5'
